I'm using the RenameCompilationUnitChange which accepted unsaved files before.
It's JDTChange.isValid that does a 'buffer.isDirty' test.
Commenting this test out makes it run again.

Created an attachment (id=7869)
Patch that fixes the problem
Verified that bug is in M7 and fixes the problem.
